)- Chrysler Group LLC is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. as CEO blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he, Page and co-founder Sergey Brin decided over the holidays to change up their`` triumvirate approach'' to leading Google because managing the business has become more complicated.
